DOC.brief_summary: Prospective randomised double-blinded placebo-controlled trial on the efficacy of scalp blocks on hemodynamic stability and opioid consumption during and after craniotomy.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Scalp Block on Hemodynamic Stability and Opioid Consumption During Craniotomy
DOC.criteria: Elective craniotomy for supratentorial lesion Allergy to local anaesthetic Psychiatric disease Inability to consent Uncontrolled intracranial hypertension
